document_data.name: Greater Dispel Magic
document_data.mainbody: '''''Greater dispel magic''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that was a more powerful and effective version of ''[[dispel magic]]''.
document_data.Effects: It could be used on a single target, on a spherical volume, or to negate another spell in the process of being cast. In addition, this spell had a chance to perform a ''[[remove curse]]'' on a creature or object.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
